Package edu.smu.tspell.wordnet.impl.file

Contains classes that provide a database implementation that retrieves information from the WordNet database files.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
DetachmentRules Encapsulates the rules of detachment used by WordNet.
FileDatabase Reference implementation of a file-based Java API for WordNet.
InflectionData Provides access to morphology exception data.
LeastRecentlyUsedCache Implements a least-recently-used (LRU) cache.
Morphology Provides morphology processing for lemma to be passed to WordNet.
PropertyNames Names of system properties used by the application.
ReferenceSynset A synset implementation that supports the concept of unresolved semantic and lexical relationships to other synsets.
RelationshipPointers Encapsulates relationship pointers for a synset and its words.
RelationshipReferences Encapsulates a collection of relationships for a synset to other synsets.
RelationshipType Defines the relationship types supported by WordNet and the text used to represent them within the synset definitions.
SampleFrameFactory Maintains a collection of generic sentence frames that are associated with synsets.
SampleIndexFactory Maintains a mapping of word senses to sentence template keys.
SampleSentenceData Caches data related to sample sentences, loading and caching the data file content only when it's accessed.
SampleTemplateFactory Maintains a collection of templates associated with synsets.
SenseIndexEntry Represents a line / entry from the sense.index file.
SenseIndexParser Parses a line from the index.sense file.
SenseIndexReader Locates entries in the index.sense file.
SenseKey Uniquely identifies a word sense within the WordNet database.
SenseKeyParser Parses text representing a sense key and returns an object that encapsulates the key data.
SynsetFactory Provides a central location from which synset instances can be retrieved.
SynsetParser Creates synset objects by parsing a line of data from a WordNet data file.
SynsetPointer Defines the location where a synset definition can be found.
SynsetReader Reads synset information from a data file (e.g., data.noun) using a pointer.
SynsetTypeConverter Converts values from database files into the corresponding synset type.
TextTranslator Performs conversion operations on text.
WordFormLookup This is the main class that's used to perform lookups based upon a word form.
WordPositions Maintains a mapping between word forms and the positions that it can occupy.
WordSensePointer Points to a particular word form within a synset.
 

Exception Summary
ParseException Used to indicate that an error occurred parsing data in one of the WordNet database files.
RetrievalException Generated when a problem occurs retrieving data from the WordNet database.
 

Package edu.smu.tspell.wordnet.impl.file Description

Contains classes that provide a database implementation that retrieves information from the WordNet database files.

The implementation represented by these classes assumes that the database files are located in the directory specified by the wordnet.database.dir system property, which can be specified on the command line when starting the virtual machine.
